api
Class Vertex

java.lang.Object
  api.Vertex
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
PageRankVertex, ShortestPathVertex
public abstract class Vertex
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Abstracts a vertex in any input graph, and defines methods that can be overrided by the application programmer to define the computation tied to every vertex in any superstep of execution.

Author:
Manasa Chandrasekhar, Kowshik Prakasam
See Also:
Serialized Form

initCompute

public void initCompute()
Initiates the computation by calling the compute() method. Clears all messages in the message queue once the computation is over.

writeSolution

public abstract void writeSolution(java.io.OutputStream anOutputStream)
                            throws java.io.IOException
This method must be override by the application programmer to dump the solution in an appropriate format upon completion of the graph problem
